answers.author: Julia Novak
answers.text:
Hi Paul
I highly recommend getting a publication by American Public Works Association.   It is their manual for accreditation - and while it doesn't sound like you are looking to go through accreditation it is what an agency would have to do to get accredited and thus like a checklist of best practices.  It is a very good source.
Good luck - I put a link in below, you can buy it from their website.
Julia
http://www.apwa.net/about/accreditation/?mode=AccreditationManual

answers.author: Bryce Wilson
answers.text:
Hi Paul,
I would have to agree with Ms. Novak as someone who has gone the through the accreditation process you are forced to address department issues.  With over 500 practices it becomes necessary for all levels of the organization to work together to codify their operational procedures and in fact create a de facto operation manual. I think the manual is a great place to start. Good Luck.
Bryce

author: Paul Christian
text:
I am looking for a manual for Public Works. Our Public Works Department has some issues and I have been asked to help them work on some ideas that can take us to the next level. I would like to know if anyone has information concerning org charts, staffing info., and standard operating proceedures. 
Help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Paul Christian
